70010000058651.description: after the events of invasion of Mr. Plague the monsters  from the mansion has disbanded and has come to fights with one another for their surivival and with their own agendas
70010000058651.intro:
the sequel to Agnostiko ORIGINS in fighting game
pinoy style fighting game, with user friendly controls for beginners
70010000058651.name: Agnostiko VS

70010000065251.description:
Undertake the case of the century in this must-play classic from ATLUS. The studio behind Shin Megami Tensei remasters "Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. The Soulless Army" with revamped visuals, QOL updates, new VO, and an overhauled battle system!
 
Taisho 20, in the Capital—
 
A young heiress approaches the Narumi Detective Agency with a strange request...to kill her. Without any further explanation, the girl is kidnapped. Apprentice detective Raidou Kuzunoha XIV, who moonlights as a Devil Summoner assigned to protect the Capital, is on the case. Raidou investigates all across the city, which includes entering the Dark Realm—a dangerous juncture between the real world and the netherworld where demons abound.
 
Become Raidou Kuzunoha and work with your allied demons to unravel the mysteries that block your path. What was once a missing persons matter soon spirals into a conspiracy that will shake not only the Capital, but the entire nation.
 
 
KEY FEATURES
 
An Enhanced Yet Faithful Remaster:
The supernatural action RPG classic returns, now revamped with visual, audio, and combat enhancements for modern consoles while staying true to the original game's style. A brand-new UI, full VO, expanded 3D environments, and more invites both veterans and newcomers alike to a nostalgic and thrilling gameplay experience.
 
A Supernatural Detective Adventure:
Channel your inner detective in a gripping, supernatural adventure with a charming cast of complex characters. Uncover the truth behind collusion swirling around the Capital with unexpected twists and turns ahead. Use both your mind and the might of your demons to leave no stone unturned.
 
A Fantastical Taisho Era Mystery: 
Navigate the historic streets of a fantastical 1930s era in Tokyo or delve into the haunting Dark Realm where demons lie in wait. With over 120 demons to summon, choose your allies wisely to prevent humanity from being consumed by darkness.
70010000065251.name: RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army

70010000071603.description:
During your journey through the gates, you will face various dangers and all you can depend on are your reflexes, the ability to move around the battlefield, the plan your actions, and good timing of casting combo spells. Enemies that you will face will require you to adjust your strategy and equipment. In Gatewalkers, with the change of your equipment comes a change of your fight style - all the skills are attributed to particular elements of your armor and weapons. You are what you wear!

The survival part of the game will expose RPG lovers to new challenges, which are rare in this genre. Looking for resources needed to craft new weapons, maintaining good mental health in the terrifying forest, managing your body temperature at the ice world, or caring for nutrition and hydration of the character are only some of the offered mechanics.

You can play Gatewalkers solo, or in cooperation with up to 4 players.

Gatewalkers features:

TEAM CO-OP

As a Gatewalker, one of the chosen few, you can go through the Gate and explore the worlds that lay on the other side. Team up with up to 3 other players in this team-based survival. Fight terrifying monsters, survive extreme weather conditions, follow the orders given by the Guild, and most importantly, stay alive!

WORLD EXPLORATION

Explore the procedurally generated worlds with unique terrain features, plants, and creatures. Discover new resources and crafting materials. Face various environmental hazards: toxic or unbreathable atmosphere, terrifying darkness, penetrating cold, and much more. Each world type introduces a unique survival mechanic that forces you to adapt. Finding food, water or wood to start a fire may be impossible. Consider carefully what to bring with you on the expedition, as no one really knows what awaits on the other side of the Gate.

TEAM SURVIVAL

Surviving alone in an unknown world is really hard. But with teammates at your side, you at least stand a chance. Share the responsibilities: start a fire to let others warm up, build a tent to let your mates rest, warn them about the dangers lurking in the night. The key to surviving is cooperation between you and your team.

SKILL BASED COMBAT

Isometric skill-based combat without auto targeting. Your skills may miss, and you can dodge enemy attacks! Good positioning during combat, balanced use of skills, proper timing and team synergy are all crucial to victory.

CRAFTING

Choose an item to craft. Discover the appropriate recipe. Raid different worlds to gather required resources. Find or create a crafting station. Finally, build the item and use it!

YOU ARE WHAT YOU WEAR

There are no predefined character classes. Each item gives you a unique set of skills, so try tinkering with different builds. Take heavy armor and a healing staff to support your mates in the front line by tanking and restoring health. Remember, you are, what you wear!

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED WORLDS

Each time you pass the Gate you will land in a different, procedurally generated world. This gives you countless opportunities, offers constant challenges, and forces you to adapt in order to win in changing conditions! Always stay cautious, modify your strategy, make fast decisions and face their consequences, because you never know what waits around the corner.
70010000071603.intro: Gatewalkers is a unique mixture of co-op game, survival and RPG. You, as a Gatewalkers, travel across different worlds in order to save your own.
70010000071603.name: Gatewalkers

70010000085945.description:
Left for dead. Ship stolen. Your legend awaits.

Marooned on Mutiny Island by your traitorous first mate, you've been left to die with nothing but the clothes on your back. The Red Dawn – YOUR ship – sails without you. Now, you must survive, build your skills, and reclaim what is rightfully yours in this open-world pirate adventure.

KEY FEATURES

Open-World Exploration: Discover diverse islands at your own pace, from sandy shores to rocky cliffs with no loading screens between land and sea.

Freedom of Choice: Chart your own course! Tackle quests for townsfolk, hunt for treasure, or challenge rival captains in naval combat.

Adventure: Explore, gather resources, and craft simple rafts, but why stop there? Any ship you spot can be captured and claimed as your own.

Real-Time Ship Battles: Command captured vessels in intense naval combat, board enemy ships, and clash with rivals in cutlass duels.

Reputation System: Your actions influence how characters respond to you. Become famous or infamous across the Arbor!
70010000085945.intro: Left for dead on Mutiny Island by a traitorous first mate, you must survive and reclaim your lost ship, the Red Dawn. In this 3D open‑world pirate adventure.
70010000085945.name: Fortune's Favor

70010000086428.description:
Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends! 

Key Features 
•	100 different games for a long and diverse journey : Experience a perfect mix of beloved classic gameplay and fresh, innovative challenges that will keep you hooked for a while! 
•	Follow the snake: Follow Tutorial Snake and his friends and improve your scores to unlock new minigames as long as you’re playing! 
•	Always better with friends: Train yourself alone and fight for the best score in multiplayer mode against your friends and family! 
•	Experience them all: From puzzle-solving and strategy games to fast-paced action and arcade classics, there's something for everyone in 100 in 1 Game Collection.
•	A game compilation like never before: 100 in 1 Game Collection includes all your favorites minigames from the acclaimed “30 in 1 Game Collection Volume 1 & 2” and adds 40 new games to the bill!
70010000086428.intro: 100 in 1 Game Collection is a gigantic compilation of 100 arcade games that blend classic arcade games with fresh concepts.
70010000086428.name: 100 in 1 Game Collection

70010000089646.description:
The enemy mothership has been destroyed and is about to explode. Reinforcements are coming, but your battered ship's guns are overheated and almost useless. Thankfully, you also have bombs. Lots of bombs. Blast Rush LS is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter with an endless supply of screen-clearing weapons.

It's just you, your ship, and seemingly endless amounts of drones in ever more complex waves. But hey, you got all those bombs to use! Blast your way out and rush to victory!

* A refreshing feature-packed take on shoot-em-ups that dares to ask: "What if bomb, but way too much?"
* Three distinct fighters with nine different screen-clearing bombs to try (and blow through enemies on an industrial scale) and extra techniques like destructive sideswipes or the slow-mo power of Hyperdodge!
* Take on over 40 intense levels with almost impossible amounts of drones in twisting, complex waves coming after your ship. 
* Prefer an even greater challenge? Have a go at the randomized Endurance or 2-minute styles.
* More blasting fun awaits in the “Blast Box,” a host of four challenges where you’ll beat the clock, fight enemies in the dark, wriggle through a dangerous maze, or launch a ship like it’s a sporting event.
* 16-bit-style graphics with a pulse-pounding chiptune soundtrack
* Explore the Library to check out game development notes, concept pixel art, a music player when you’re away from the action, and more!
* The full original version of Blast Rush is included as part of the package!
70010000089646.intro:
Blast your way through relentless waves in Blast Rush LS! 
Unlimited bombs, intense challenges, and explosive 
action await in this fresh take on bullet hell shooters.
70010000089646.name: Blast Rush LS

70010000090362.description:
Enter a colourful world that's looking for a new football star! Defeat your opponents with your amazing skills and take the cup home! 

Get through the tutorial, master the game controls and choose your team to start your football career. Defeat all your opponents while collecting achievements and have fun with the different game modes.

Become the biggest football star!
70010000090362.intro: Take the title of the best football player in a cute cartoon world.
70010000090362.name: Football Mini Stars

70010000090569.description:
The Beast is real—and it’s waiting for you.

In Chronicles of the Wolf, you’ll play as Mateo Lombardo, the last apprentice of the Rose Cross Order, on a quest to hunt the infamous Beast of Gévaudan. This dark and thrilling platforming adventure blends fast-paced combat, challenging exploration, and deep storytelling, making it a must-play for fans of the genre.

Explore vast castles, treacherous forests, and mysterious ruins, all teeming with danger and secrets. Talk to locals, collect powerful weapons, solve intricate puzzles, and unlock game-changing abilities to forge your own path through this sprawling, interconnected world. Along the way, you’ll face brutal bosses that will push your skills to the limit.

Featuring a special guest appearance from Bloodless, the iconic crimson-soaked adversary from a critically acclaimed gothic action series, voiced by Kira Buckland. Immerse yourself in the haunting narration of Robert Belgrade, the legendary voice behind some of gaming’s most celebrated dark fantasy and adventure epics. Chronicles of the Wolf delivers a gripping metroidvania experience, blending fast-paced combat, rich storytelling, and deep exploration—continuing the legacy of the Migami Monsterverse.

With its stunning illustrated cutscenes and a haunting soundtrack composed by Jeffrey Montoya, Chronicles of the Wolf delivers an immersive and cinematic experience. Enhancing the game’s rich atmosphere, Oscar Araujo, renowned for his work on one of the most iconic adventures series in the history of video games, contributes a breathtaking guest track that perfectly sets the tone for this dark and sprawling journey. Combined with deep historical inspiration and intense gameplay, this is more than just a game—it’s your next obsession.
70010000090569.intro: Hunt the legendary Beast of Gévaudan, conquer the darkness that lies in wait, and forge your path to glory in this epic adventure.
70010000090569.name: Chronicles of the Wolf

70010000091288.description:
Embark on an extraordinary journey in Wéko The Mask Gatherer, a single-player action-adventure set in a beautifully crafted fantasy world.

As Wéko, an intrepid adventurer, you’ll explore diverse and enchanting landscapes filled with secrets, challenges, and mysteries to uncover. Utilize powerful collectible masks to gain unique abilities, solve intricate puzzles, and complete engaging missions. Whether navigating treacherous waters, uncovering hidden paths, or assisting villagers, every step brings a new discovery.

Key Features:

-Single-Player Action-Adventure Gameplay: A rich and immersive experience designed for exploration, combat, and puzzle-solving.
-Collectible Masks: Discover masks that grant unique powers and allow you to adapt your playstyle to every situation.
-Diverse and Stunning Environments: Explore vibrant villages, shadowy forests, and challenging underground areas, each brought to life with rich detail and atmosphere.
-Engaging Combat and Puzzles: Test your skills with accessible combat mechanics and puzzles that encourage creative thinking.
-Heartfelt Storyline: Experience Wéko’s journey of growth, courage, and discovery as he faces emotional and physical trials.
-8-12 Hours of Gameplay: Enjoy a captivating main storyline, complemented by side quests and hidden secrets.
70010000091288.intro: Wéko the Mask Gatherer is a 3D action-adventure game where you step into the shoes of Wéko, a mysterious adventurer on a quest to collect the seven powerful Primordial Masks.
70010000091288.name: Wéko The Mask Gatherer

70010000092088.description:
Are you ready to harness your cosmic powers? Embark on an exciting summer adventure and uncover the hidden mystery as you TEXT, DATE, and FIGHT in this turn-based strategy dating sim!

| Story 

Our heroine, Luce, has returned to her hometown from the big city for the summer to escape her past, but the town of Vermillion is more than meets the eye. No worries! Nothing like a fantastic summer vacation and some wild parties to forget all your woes right?

…That is, until a mysterious cosmic force suddenly grants Luce magical powers and a sick transformation sequence to boot! With her new powers, Luce and her friends, Will and CJ, are off to fight a strange threat as the ultimate magical girl crew and uncover the mystery of their hometown! (And maybe find love along the way!)

| Cast

Enemies-to-lovers? Friends-to-lovers? Friends with benefits? Whether you want romance or friendship, there’s something for everyone! Hit up the hot singles in Vermillion and explore a variety of different relationships with friends, civilians, and even villains!

| Gameplay

Uncover an exciting visual novel story where YOU make the decisions. As you embark on Luce’s journey, choose from a variety of different responses to build your relationships with different characters whether it’s in person or through text!

Live the life of a superhero! Defend Vermillion from monsters and villains with your team through exciting strategic, turn-based combat.

Power up your cosmic powers and create powerful combos with your fellow heroes to save the day!

| Features

- Play several chapters of visual novel adventure.
- Choose between 9 diverse characters to befriend, date, or antagonize with otome-inspired gameplay.
- Fight monsters in a strategic turn-based combat system.
- Text your friends, power up, and get the latest gossip through a collection of apps in an interactive phone interface.
70010000092088.intro: A mysterious force transforms you and other highly attractive people in your area into superheroes and villains! TEXT, DATE and FIGHT your friends and enemies alike.
70010000092088.name: Nova Hearts

70010000092096.description:
Dive into the world of dreams in Through the Nightmares! This is a hardcore platformer where you play as the Sandman, a size-shifting spirit said to bring people good dreams.

Several children are lost in the kingdom of Morpheus, the mad god of dreams, who turns sleep into a prison. To bring the children back to their families, the Sandman must descend to a place where even the most secret of fears come to life…

• Size-Shifting Platformer — Change your size to squeeze through tight spaces, boost your jumps, interact with the environment, and discover hidden shortcuts.

• Challenges For Everyone — Enjoy ruthless precision gaming with instant respawns and a unique checkpoint system that lets you control where you respawn.

• Six Unique Locations — Explore 45 handcrafted levels across three chapters and six different locations based on Nordic folklore, modern-day suburbia, and medieval ruins.

• Reactive Dreamscapes — Manipulate your environment with the Sandman’s abilities to open up new pathways, discover secrets, and solve tricky challenges.

• Dream Secrets — Collect personal items from each nightmare to learn more about the children’s past, reveal the deeper story, and piece together the truth of what happened to Morpheus.

• Towering Terrors — Enormous creatures lurk deep within the dream world, hunting you down. Escape their clutches… or face a swift end.

• Immersive Visuals and Soundtrack — Nightmare dreamscapes are brought to life with striking low poly art and a haunting original soundtrack.

They’re waiting to be rescued. But the dream world already knows you’re here. And it will stop at nothing to ensure you never leave. Are you ready to defy the Dream God himself?
70010000092096.intro: A hardcore platformer for anyone who’s ever been jolted awake from a fright.
70010000092096.name: Through the Nightmares

70010000092308.description:
Cornhole is a popular lawn game enjoyed by people around the world at outdoor events.  Use motion controls to toss the bags onto the board or into the hole for points!  Play one-off games for fun and practice. Enter career mode and play in venues around the world as you climb to Cornhole stardom!

Supports 1 to 4 players with optional AI players.  Fun for the whole family!
70010000092308.intro: Toss beanbags onto the board or into the hole to score in this fun party game!
70010000092308.name: Cornhole

70010000092310.description:
Relive Evel Knievel's legendary jumps like never before! From daring motorcycle stunts to riding a rocket over Snake River Canyon, this is the ultimate tribute to America's greatest daredevil. Play solo or multiplayer with up to four friends!

Laugh with friends as you crash hilariously! Earn trophies, climb the leaderboards, and customize Evel’s gear with iconic outfits and powerful bikes. There's always a new challenge waiting!

Can you conquer Evel Knievel’s most daring jumps and land safely on the other side? Get ready for the ride of your life!

True Story
Evel Knievel became the most famous daredevil in history by performing dangerous and amazing motorcycle jumps. Relive the exploits of this American folk hero by stepping into his shoes with the Official Evel Knievel game!

Advance through his spectacular career, starting with a humble 250cc Scrambler, jumping Rattlesnakes and Lions. Work your way up to the 750cc Ultimate and insane jumps over 13 London Buses and the Las Vegas Casino Fountain!

This update of the Official Evel Knievel game adds a new venue, Snake River Canyon, and new vehicle, the Skycycle X-2 rocket, as well as new multiplayer support! Have a laugh-out-loud, fun time with your family and friends!

Play with Friends!
Play single player or local multiplayer with up to four players! 
Motorcycle multiplayer is cooperative, with players taking turns to complete the course and advance the group to the next venue. 
Rocket multiplayer is competitive, with players launching their Skycycle X-2 rockets at the same time, vying to score the highest total points over several attempts to land closest to the target.  

Level Up Your Rider 
Achieve goals for experience points so you can level up and increase your rider stats: 
Strength – Survive harder landings
Charisma – Collect coins in a larger radius 
Agility – Rotate your bike in the air faster
Goals are revealed as you advance, with up to four to choose from at any given time. 

Customize & Upgrade 
Collect as many coins as you can while riding through the obstacles and flying through the air! Spend your coins to buy loads of fantastic outfits, including Evel Knievel’s iconic White and Blue leathers, and upgrade your bike all the way to the awesome Jet-Powered Stratocycle!
Plenty of Content!
• 28 Challenging Jumps in 10 Historic Locations, including;
     - Las Vegas (Casino Fountain)
     - Chicago (Man Eating Sharks!)
     - Ontario (18 Cars and a Van)
     - London (13 London Buses)
     - NEW: Snake River Canyon (rocket jump over canyon) 
• 11 Amazing Bikes, including:
     - 250cc Scrambler
     - 650cc Deluxe
     - 750cc Ultimate
     - The Jet-Powered Stratocycle
     - NEW: Skycycle X-2 rocket for the Snake River Canyon jump
•  8 Classic Outfits and 20 Special Helmets to collect
•  Achievements and Local Leaderboards
•  Dozens of Goals (Complete goals to Level Up Evel and boost his stats)
•  Bronze, Silver and Gold Trophies to earn on each Jump

“Anybody can jump a motorcycle. The trouble begins when you try to land it!” – Evel Knievel
70010000092310.intro: Ride and jump your way to glory on a motorcycle and a prayer!
70010000092310.name: Evel Knievel

70010000092312.description:
Finnigan Fox is a 2D action platformer with fun RPG elements. Inspired by the glorious days of 16-bit platformers, Finnigan Fox presents classic gameplay in beautiful, colorful, hi-res graphics with a difficulty level adapted to modern sensibilities--meaning it’s not so brutally hard!

A FOX LIKE NO OTHER 

Play as our titular hero, a clever red fox named Finnigan. Run and leap your way across the land on your mission to save the forest. Wield your bladed crossbow to defeat enemies in your path! Cast magic that changes the season to alter the terrain and neutralize some enemies. You’ll need a combination of melee and magic to solve the puzzles in a mystical land filled with strange creatures and challenging landscapes. 

UPGRADES & BOSSES!

Collect treasure and special items along the way (sometimes hidden). Trade them in at the forest shops to upgrade your arrows and increase your physical and magical capacity.  You’ll need those upgrades to prepare yourself to take on screen-sized bosses!

Each boss is a giant enemy with a different behavior and unique vulnerability. Use your nimble movement to avoid their attacks until you can solve the puzzle of how to defeat them!

5 SEASONS!

Switch between seasons to alter the terrain, explore new areas, outfox enemies and uncover amazing secrets.

HERO’S JOURNEY

Help Finnigan Fox uncover the mystery of the 5th season and bring back justice to the forests and its inhabitants.

ACTION PLATFORMER!

Finnigan Fox is an epic adventure with engaging RPG elements, clever puzzles and thrilling platforming.
70010000092312.intro: Finnigan Fox journeys through mystical lands, wielding a bladed crossbow and season-switching magic to overcome foes and save the forest!
70010000092312.name: Finnigan Fox

70010000092994.description:
One day, you come across a picture book about Meems, carefree little creatures that live under the World Tree. However, the book’s ending is a sad one...
Together with the Meems, you can rewrite destiny and spin it into a happily ever after!

[Help the Meems!]
Meems are adorable, food-loving creatures that live beneath the World Tree.
One day, their precious Miracle Pot, which makes any dish delicious, was destroyed—putting their very survival at risk!
Lend a hand to the remaining Meems and help them build a thriving new world!

[What are Meems?]
Meems are playful little creatures who love to eat, sleep, and have fun!
As they experience new things, they unlock new skills and even change their appearance.
By breeding different Meems, you can create endless unique variations. Find your perfect Meem!

[Grow the World Tree!]
The World Tree thrives on the light of joy released when Meems gather for feasts and enjoy special meals.
As the tree grows, it unlocks new areas for Meems to explore and expand their adventures!

[Build a Better Life for the Meems!]
From cozy Meem Houses and Love Nests to resource centers, farms, and decorative structures, you can build a variety of facilities to improve Meem life.
Gather materials on your adventures and create a happy, thriving home for your Meems!
70010000092994.intro: Together with the Meems, you can rewrite destiny and spin it into a happily ever after!
70010000092994.name: Hungry Meem

70010000094001.description:
Experience intense, tactical FPS action like never before in SHADOWFRAME — a unique black-and-white shooter where every movement rewrites time itself.

Whether you're dodging bullets in slow motion or plotting the perfect takedown, SHADOWFRAME turns every step into a strategic decision.

Features:
Freeze Time, Master Combat: Time stands still until you move. Think fast, move smart, and outmaneuver enemies in a world where every second counts.
Campaign Mode: Fight against the clock through 15 stylish, handcrafted levels.
Endless Survival: Face never-ending waves of enemies. How long can you survive?
Striking Visual Style: Play in a bold black-and-white world where shadows reveal danger and movement brings it to life.

SHADOWFRAME brings stylish, slow-motion combat - perfect for players who love a twist on classic FPS gameplay.

Move with purpose. Shoot with precision. Survive in the shadows.
70010000094001.intro: Freeze time. Analyze the battlefield. Then make your move. In SHADOWFRAME, reflexes alone won’t save you — you’ll need precision, patience, and planning to survive.
70010000094001.name: SHADOWFRAME

70010000095114.description:
Fantasy of War is a Strategy RPG.
Move each unit and defeat monsters and enemy forces to advance.
As your level goes up, your status goes up. You can also learn new skills and magic.
Gather your friends, strengthen your army, and take back the homeland.
70010000095114.intro: A war Strategy RPG where you fight to reclaim the homeland!
70010000095114.name: Fantasy of War

70010000095119.description:
A fixed-screen action game that allows you to play with up to two players using flower fairies Tamabo and Hanabo. Your goal: to fill the entire stage with blooming flowers.

Story:
Every nook and cranny in Bloom Paradise was once filled with flowers of every color, until one day when pesky pests came and ravaged the land, rendering it unrecognizable. Thus, flower fairies Tamabo and Hanabo have joined forces, setting off on an adventure to restore Bloom Paradise to its former glory and get rid of those irksome pests.

How to Play:
Play as either Tamabo (Player 1) or Hanabo (Player 2) and make flowers bloom. Fill all the grounds in each stage to clear it.

How you bloom flowers differs between single-player mode and two-player mode. In single-player mode, flowers bloom on the ground as Tamabo walks across. In two-player mode, however, when either Tamabo or Hanabo walks across the ground, only flower buds appear. The other character must then touch these buds to make them bloom. Work together to take back Bloom Paradise from the pests.

Both Tamabo and Hanabo can shoot water in the direction they're facing with the use of the attack button. Flowers can't bloom when the ground is covered in mud, so use water to clean up and eradicate any pests standing in your way.
70010000095119.intro: A fixed-screen action game offering a 2-player coop mode.
70010000095119.name: Bloom Paradise

70010000095754.description:
Step into the world's most unusual sauna game and become a legendary Aufguss Maestro.
We believe you have what it takes to be the best heat-bringer in the underworld!

Purify zombies in a sauna from hell!
You’ve taken a part-time job as an Aufguss Master in the demon realm, and it’s your job to bring the heat.
Use tools like löyly, aufguss fans, and wood stoves to turn up the temperature.
Chill in the cold bath, lie back in a relaxing chair, or go all-out heatwave mode.
Collect unique sauna gear and customize your demon-slaying wellness session.

Classic Sauna Facilities:
Zombie Bath – where the undead gather
Spa Love – chill time with succubi
Great Sauna Hell – for men who endure extreme heat

Survival Sauna for Ranking:
Endless Summer – where underworld party monsters spend the weekend

Rogue-lite Exploration Sauna:
Sauna Fairytale – a hidden fairy sanctuary stolen by a dark heat maestro.
70010000095754.intro:
Bring the heat.
Purge the dead.
Rule the sauna.
70010000095754.name: Sauna of the DEAD

70010000095796.description:
Nif Nif is a wholesome deckbuilder about helping the forest and your animal pals, designed to be easy to pick up for beginners of the genre, but with strategic depth for those who want a challenge!

BUILD THE BEST DECK!
Choose your cards with special abilities as you progress through the levels to be best prepared to face the final bosses that await you at the end of the forest. Decide what to bring on each adventure to keep things fresh, and choose between two characters, each with unique cards.

You can collect seeds, plant them and cook your own power-up potions in the form of delicious hot soups!

WHOLESOME AND CHILL
Nif Nif is a comfortable and cozy experience set in a whimsical colorful world full of friendly and quirky characters that our little piglet will meet along the way on lovely encounters.

For EVERYONE
Designed for a general audience: from fans of deck-builders or cozy games, to kids (it helps them practice mental math!) or even people with no experience in video games. Accessible and totally non-violent.

Includes…

Procedurally generated maps
Two playable characters (Nif Nif and Cat) with different decks
Gardening and cooking mini game
Unlockable hats to change abilities
Progress through levels, unlockable hats and achievements
70010000095796.intro: Clean your friends, build your deck and save the forest from the evil goo!
70010000095796.name: Nif Nif

70010000096024.description:
Each run takes just 20–30 minutes — perfect for relaxing anytime! Whether you're unwinding after a long day or just killing time, it's a great way to de-stress.

Choose from 10 unique classes and 7 different weapons, then mix and match to create your own personalized combat style. Hidden classes and secret talents await discovery too!

Every playstyle offers a complete build path, with multiple branches and directions to explore.

Each stage comes with fully adjustable difficulty settings, so you'll always find the perfect level of challenge.
70010000096024.intro: Blast through monster hordes with crazy weapons in a wild bullet hell! It’s chaotic, casual, and seriously fun!
70010000096024.name: Bag Hero

70010000096916.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Yadal Dock, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
 high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000096916.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Yadal Dock

70010000097493.description:
Save the world with fishing!?
This is the story of two young men who go on an adventure to catch the mysterious sea creatures called "Sea'Az".

”Sea'Az” a mysterious marine organism 
In the world of Sea Fantasy, marine life called “Sea'Az” inhabit the oceans and lakes. They vary in appearance, size and rarity, and all Sea'Az can be fished. 

Fishing the Sea'Az
To catch Sea'Az, perform a successful “Gauge Action”. Be careful, as there are Sea'Az with more powerful individual “gauge gimmick”.

Crafting with Sea'Az materials 
You can create equipment (fishing rods and hooks) using materials obtained from the Sea'Az you catch. By creating strong equipment, you can take advantage of the fishing action.

Explore by boat
Players can obtain a ship by advancing through the storyline.  Players can freely get on and off the ship and explore the vast pixel world.

Various 2D actions other than fishing
It is not only about fishing. You can enjoy various 2D action elements in between fishing.
70010000097493.intro:
This is not a peaceful fishing game.
The end of the world is approaching...
70010000097493.name: Sea Fantasy

70010000097780.description:
Our heroes' next adventure is in...dinosaur times?! This time the bad guys are trying to destroy the future! The only way to fight back is with dino-transformations!

This installment includes:
- 5-minute recap of the story so far
- Special feature episodes 1-4

◆Visual Novel (Story)◆
In an effort to save a mysterious dinosaur that appears before them, Treffy and her friends travel back in time to the age of dinosaurs! There they encounter a madman bent on destroying the very future they came from!

Set following the events of Season 1, this title acts as a theatrical release for an anime might.

◆Boss Battles◆
2D action designed to be playable by all.

-Gain invincibility by dancing!

◆Series Overview◆
A visual novel series designed to remind players of the joys of Saturday morning cartoons.
Packed with transformations, cards, dancing, and robots, too! The adventure goes on—forever and always!

-Story features opening, ending, and commercial interlude animations!
This installment also features an all-in-one theatrical release mode.

-The clock on the top left can be changed to 8:00, 9:00, or whatever time you wish!

-Features all original music tracks!

-Pixel art visuals serve to offer real 2000s nostalgia."
70010000097780.intro:
The second installment in the 2000s era styled anime-themed Kokoro Clover series!
A visual novel paired with boss battles!
70010000097780.name: Kokoro Clover SUN - Prehistoric Invaders!

70010000098599.description:
When Luna makes an unexpected discovery of a flower its great beauty is quickly stained with a living nightmare.
Luna and her dog, Jasper, begin to experience unusual events as their bodies start to change and vines slowly consume their home.
First person short indie horror game, featuring body horror and a sad and creepy story.
70010000098599.intro: Short indie horror game, featuring body horror and a sad and creepy story.
70010000098599.name: Balavour

70010000098712.description:
In Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow, you’re back as the smartest pup on the pasture — but this time, the farm’s gone full sci-fi! With teleporters, conveyor belts, oil slicks, and sneaky holes, you’ll need all your brainpower (and tail-wagging determination) to guide your woolly friends to safety.

Each level brings new tricks and tougher challenges. From slippery winter fields to haunted hayrides and blooming spring labs, you'll herd your way through 30 handcrafted puzzles packed with quirky tech and clever twists.

Key Features:

Grid-based puzzles with futuristic farm gadgets

Undo and restart anytime — no pressure, just paws-itive thinking

3 themed worlds: Winter, Halloween, and Spring

Mechanics like sheep teleporters, rotating belts, gates, oil slicks, and more!

If you love solving puzzles, thinking ahead, and helping an overachieving Border Collie save the day, this is your game. Ready to herd the flock of tomorrow?
70010000098712.intro: The future of farming just got fluffier
70010000098712.name: Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow

70010000099906.description:
Unearth the wonders of New England in a game that combines history, adventure, and hidden object challenges. 
'Finding America: New England' takes you on an unforgettable journey. 
Seek out hidden objects amidst stunning scenery and unlock the stories of America's colonial past.

Along your journey, you'll encounter fascinating trivia about the iconic locations, play fun mini-games, and see the beauty of the New England.

- Behold the sights of New England, all done in a Hidden Object style.
- Play over 30 fun minigames, all connected to the Great Lakes area!
- Pick up fun facts about the region!
- Collector's Edition contains 12 more chapters and 6 exclusive Hidden Object scenes!
70010000099906.intro: Explore scenic landscapes and rich history of this iconic region.
70010000099906.name: Finding America: New England Collector's Edition
ratingContent: Referencias al Uso de Alcohol y Tabaco

70050000054033.description:
The first return to the village after becoming Raidou Kuzunoha XIV. 

Additional downloadable content featuring a set of three trainings designed for players who wish to "save time" when grinding for EXP, in-game currency, and stat increases.

- "Kuzunoha Village Trainings: Power" grants experience for Raidou and his demons. 
- "Kuzunoha Village Trainings: Wealth" grants "Yen" (in-game currency). 
- "Kuzunoha Village Trainings: Indulgences" grants Incense (increases the stats of Raidou and his demons) and Sake (increases the loyalty of your demons). 

*All of the above DLC can be used once access to the "Nameless Shrine" is unlocked. 
*For further information on their use, please see "How to Use Downloadable Content" in the in-game Detective Journal .
70050000054033.name: Kuzunoha Village Trainings

70050000054034.description:
Defeat demons to earn special items.

Additional downloadable content that grants a special book upon completing exclusive trials.

4 special Aril Rifts that trigger the "Trial of a Hundred Demons", will be added to the in-game "Training Hall".

1. Upon completion of "Trial of a Hundred Demons - Formation" you will receive a "Book of Lucky Capote".
2. Upon completion of "Trial of a Hundred Demons - Existence" you will receive a "Book of Mage's Craft".
3. Upon completion of "Trial of a Hundred Demons - Destruction" you will receive a "Book of Hero's Might".
4. Upon completion of "Trial of a Hundred Demons - Nothingness" you will receive a "Book of Destructive Joy".

*These trials can be challenged after starting Episode 3 and onwards. 
*For further information on their use, please see "How to Use Downloadable Content" in the in-game Detective Journal .
70050000054034.name: Demons of the Aril Rift

70050000054035.description:
Popular demons from the Shin Megami Tensei series have been added in this remaster!

Additional downloadable content that allows the players to recruit these demons as their allies.

The following six demons are included:
- Pyro Order: Fionn mac Cumhaill
- Frost Order: Artemis
- Volt Order: Zeus
- Wind Order: Huang Long
- Fury Order: Gozuki
- Fury Order: Mezuki

*Any of these demons can be recruited once access to the Goumaden is unlocked.
*For further information on how to recruit demons, please see "How to Use Downloadable Content" in the in-game Detective Journal.
70050000054035.name: Guest Demons Pack

70050000054036.description:
Forbidden books that grant special abilites. 

Additional downloadable content that includes a pack of special skill books, which allows demons to learn high-tier skills. Recommended for those who want to “save time” enhancing their demons.

The following special skill books are included: 

- Book of Agidyne x1
- Book of Bufudyne x1
- Book of Ziodyne x1
- Book of Zandyne x 1
- Book of Tarukajaon x1
- Book of Makakajaon x1
- Book of Rakukajaon ×1
- Book of Diarahan ×1
- Book of Media ×1
- Book of State of Bliss ×1
- Book of Samarecarm ×1

*These special skill books can be obtained in-game without purchasing this additional content.
*For further information on how to utilize this DLC, please see "How to Use Downloadable Content" in the in-game Detective Journal .
70050000054036.name: Skill Book Pack

70050000054037.description:
Perfect preparation against powerful enemies. 

Additional downloadable content that is recommended for preparing before battle with strong opponents. 

The following items are included: 

- Renki x 2 (essential crafting material in Sword Alchemy)
- Balm of Life x 9 (revives Raidou after falling in battle)
- Survival Erudition x 10  (automatically revives Raidou once with full HP)

*Renki and Balm of Life can be obtained in-game without purchasing this DLC.
*Survival Erudition is only available as DLC. This item cannot be used in the "Sleuth" difficulty level, as Raidou and his demons cannot not die in this difficulty. 
*For further information on how to utilize these items, please see "How to Use Downloadable Content" in the in-game Detective Journal.
70050000054037.name: Survival Pack

70050000054040.description:
As a special pre-order bonus, receive the cosmetic Raidou Glasses. With these glasses that were popular in the Taisho Era, his charm will increase beyond what one can handle.

*Pre-Order incentive available before 21:00 PDT time Wednesday, June 18, 2025.
70050000054040.name: Raidou Glasses

70050000058034.description:
Relive Lara Croft’s greatest adventures with two action-packed tables! From the legendary halls of Croft Manor to mysterious tombs around the world, test your skills, uncover secrets, and play through iconic moments from the Tomb Raider franchise.

Adventures of Lara Croft: Embark on a globe-spanning pinball journey, reliving Lara Croft’s most legendary adventures. Face iconic enemies, explore ancient temples, and collect mythical artifacts in this action-packed pinball table!

Secrets of Croft Manor: Step inside Lara Croft’s ancestral home, where adventure awaits behind every corner. Train for Lara’s next expedition, explore hidden rooms, and uncover the manor’s deepest secrets! 

Whether you're training in Croft Manor or uncovering lost artifacts around the world, Tomb Raider Pinball is packed with adventure, nostalgia, and high-score thrills. Adventure awaits... are you ready?
70050000058034.name: Pinball FX - Tomb Raider Pinball

70070000026049.description:
Pre-orders include the cosmetic Raidou Glasses. Available before 21:00 PDT time Thursday, June 18, 2025. 

RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army - Digital Deluxe Edition includes: 

- Base game - "RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army"
DLC Content - Kuzunoha Village Trainings (Grant access to trials with experience, in-game currency, and stat increase rewards) 
- DLC Content - Demons of the Aril Rift (Grants access to battles with Special Book rewards) 
- DLC Content - Guest Demons Pack (Grants access to popular demons from the Shin Megami Tensei series) 
- DLC Content - Skill Book Pack (Forbidden books that grant special abilites)
- DLC Content - Survival Pack (Grants items that help for Battle)

*This is a bundle set that allows you to get the base game of the "RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army" and paid additional contents at a discount.  Please be careful not to repurchase the same items from separately sold content.

*For more information on each DLC item, please refer to their individual listings.

*This bundle does not include any free additional content.  You will need to download it separately.
70070000026049.name:
RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army 
- Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000061463.description:
90 seconds to hunt as many chickens and collect as many points as possible. Beat your personal record and compete with players around the globe. 

But wait, there's more! Score over 800 points, and you'll unlock the full version of the classic Moorhuhn Remake.

Finally, you can enjoy this Moorhuhn classic, also known as Crazy Chicken and Chicken Hunter, featuring the wildest and most famous chicken in the world on modern devices. Step into the shoes of the chicken hunter. Move the screen left and right to find more chickens. Aim and shoot quickly to take down all the flying birds. The harder they are to hit, the more points you score!

The Original Moorhuhn Hunt is a great way to kill a few minutes or spend a few hours while challenging other players worldwide. The hunting season is open!

Note: Moorhuhn Remake is a reimagining of the classic Moorhuhn Remake game. It is distinct from the separately sold Moorhuhn Remake with Multiplayer available in the Nintendo eShop.
70010000061463.intro: Celebrate 25 years of The Original Moorhuhn Hunt! Play the iconic game that started it all and unlock the classic Moorhuhn Remake as a bonus.
70010000061463.name: The Original Moorhuhn Hunt

70010000092957.description:
Design, build, and automate a railway empire! Start with a few tracks and stations and grow your network into a thriving automated system of trains crisscrossing real-world-inspired city maps. Watch your creation evolve from simple manual connections into a fully automated masterpiece!

Master the Art of Automation
Experience the thrill of dispatching and transforming your small, manual network into an automated, self-sufficient marvel. 

-Plan and build with precision to keep trains running on time.
-Strategize upgrades to expand and improve operations.
-Automate and expand to watch your creation thrive.

Rail Around the Globe
Build rail networks across multiple maps inspired by real-world locations - Amsterdam, Berlin, Chicago, Glasgow, London, Osaka, Paris, Prague, Shanghai, Tokyo, New York, and more!

Play Your Way
Whether you’re a casual player or a master strategist, Rail Route offers something for everyone:
-Story Mode: Learn the game under the guidance of a fatherly veteran conductor who takes you under his wing and leads you on a journey of memories and timeless life lessons.
-Endless Mode: Build your network from scratch at your own pace in a relaxed and chill play session.
-Timetable Mode: Solve puzzle-like challenges on pre-set maps and schedules, designed for players who enjoy a strategic test.
-Rush Hour Mode: Face waves of intense dispatching challenges, ideal for those who thrive on overcoming complex obstacles.

Easy to Start, Rewarding to Master
With its intuitive design, Rail Route is accessible to new players while offering deep gameplay for automation enthusiasts. Every signal you place, every contract you take adds a new layer of complexity, reflecting the challenges of real-world rail management.
70010000092957.intro: Build, manage and automate your rail network.
70010000092957.name: Rail Route

70010000093194.intro: Build your dream farm in this unique blend of farming and puzzle adventure! Grow crops, raise adorable animals, and solve delightful puzzles to unlock new items and expand your farm.
70010000093194.name: Hope's Farm 2

70010000095060.description:
Agarta has been designed to show you how valuable and important every decision you make in your individual life, every choice you make is. Because every choice you make is also a renunciation and you cannot undo any decision.


Have you ever woken up in the morning, while waiting in line at the bank, watching politicians lie by looking people in the eyes, or just watching all the injustices you've been through, feeling that you didn't have the strength to shout? Even if it didn't, it definitely will one day. Because as an ordinary person, all the decisions that affect your life are made by those who hold power expensive drinking tables. Nothing else remains more than the torture of waking up in the morning to go to work, or the tears you shed to fall asleep at night.
Agarta is a story written in blood by a serial killer based on this “cry for life”, shaped around our moral judgements and decisions that make us human, and who understands that “truth” and “good” can only be “gain” in the world we live in.
Cerrah, the serial killer who has committed murders in many countries of the world for thirty years, and whose name or anything else are not known other than the nickname given to him by the media, sought by Interpol with the Red Notice, reappears. Questioning the concepts of justice and law, Cerrah embarks on a struggle against those who hold power and aim to expand their personal empires that they created by protecting their personal interests.
By directing and making the choices, you will bring Cerrah to one of the 22 possible endings.
Agarta has been designed to show you the value and significance of every decision you make and every choice you make. Because every choice you make is also a renunciation and you cannot undo any decision.
Agarta's script team includes Ali Rıdvan Tekeoğlu, as well as Taha Ulukaya, the screenwriter of the web series "The Cheat", which has received awards in many international festivals.


-Cinematic FMV type Interactive thriller filmed in 4K with real actors.
-Over 100 selections leading to one of the 22 finals without pause.
-A Temperament Model consisting of the sum of the choices made.
-The cast includes artists such as Mehmet Küçük, Burak Sarımola, Berna Adıgüzel, Yaşar Aydınlıoğlu, Alper Türedi.
-For a realistic gameplay, selections cannot be undone.
70010000095060.name: Agarta

70010000097228.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to build your real estate empire in "Real Estate Simulator," a deep and dynamic business simulation game. Begin as a small-time property investor and strategize your way to become a tycoon in the cutthroat world of real estate. Navigate market trends, negotiate deals, and outsmart competitors in this immersive simulation experience.
- From Broke to Rich: Embark on a journey from Broke to Rich, developing skills and overcoming challenges with unwavering determination.
Start with a tent as your first home.
- Interactive NPC Negotiations: Engage with a range of NPC clients, from cautious first-time buyers to wealthy investors. Understand their needs, negotiate terms, and close deals that shape your path to success.
- Property Development and Management: Purchase, renovate, and sell properties across the city. From cheap living areas to luxury skyscrapers, each property brings unique challenges and opportunities.
- Intuitive Controls and UI: Whether you're a seasoned tycoon or new to business sims, intuitive controls and a clear user interface make managing your empire accessible and enjoyable.
- Unique Challenges and Achievements: From market crashes to VIP clients, face unique challenges that test your strategic prowess. 
Unlock achievements and make your mark in the world of real estate.
70010000097228.intro: Buy, renovate, sell — rule the real estate market.
70010000097228.name: REAL ESTATE Simulator - FROM BUM TO MILLIONAIRE

70010000097502.description:
Everyone’s favorite ham-loving caveman named Dude has been abducted by evil space aliens. 

In this new adventure, our heroine must go on a quest through a colorful prehistoric world to save her beloved. 

Run and jump, level up, obtain helpful items, and even ride dinosaurs while overcoming challenging enemies and dangerous traps. 

Explore 4 colorful stone-age environmentson Gal’s journey to free her ham-eating boyfriend.


Features:
* Platform action gameplay
* Colorful pixel art
* Gain levels and obtain items
* Ride dinosaurs 
* 4 worlds with branching paths
70010000097502.intro: Experience an adventure in stone-age world full of prehistoric elements!
70010000097502.name: Prehistoric Gal

70010000097724.description:
Aye, captain! The seven seas still hide secrets — and no one’s better suited to uncover them than you! In Pirate Trails 2: Tentacles & Treasures, the most beloved pirate puzzle on the high seas is back with new maps, new dangers... and a lot more tentacles!

Embark on a tropical journey where your ship must follow perfect routes through a sea of hexagons. But beware! The Kraken is watching, and its tentacles block the way to the most valuable treasures. Only gunpowder can stop your ship from becoming sushi!

Collect powder kegs, trace clever paths, gather golden treasures, and lead your ship to the final port — without becoming calamari.

Explore 30 handcrafted levels across three unique biomes:

Tortuga – Where it all begins (and where the tentacles are still shy).
Port Royal – Routes multiply, and the tentacles grow fiercer.
Nassau – The ultimate challenge, where every powder keg counts and a single wrong turn could spell victory... or shipwreck.

You don’t control the ship — you control its fate. Rotate, swap, and place puzzle tiles wisely. When the route is ready, press the button and watch the ship sail through your brilliant strategy.
70010000097724.intro: Arrr you ready for more puzzlin', plunderin' and perilous tentacles?
70010000097724.name: Pirate Trails: Tentacles and Treasures

70010000099576.description:
Saddle up and get ready for a paw-some adventure in Cats Visiting Wild West! Explore charming hand-drawn scenes filled with saloons, dusty towns, steam trains, and desert canyons — all packed with mischievous hidden cats waiting to be found.

Search every corner of these nostalgic Wild West illustrations and test your observation skills. From sneaky cats hiding in barrels to ones peeking out of cowboy hats, can you find them all?

Each scene also hides a special collectible object — gather them all to complete your Wild West collection!

Features:
     5 beautifully illustrated Wild West scenes
     80 hidden cats to find in each level
     A collectible item hidden in every scene
     Relaxing gameplay perfect for casual players
     Timer and leaderboard for competitive cat hunters

Grab your hat, partner — those kitties won’t find themselves!
70010000099576.intro: Explore charming Wild West scenes and find hidden cats hiding in saloons, canyons, and steam trains. Relax, search, and collect them all!
70010000099576.name: Cats Visiting Wild West

70010000093764.description:
No one remembers what the world looked like before, except for a team of brave rangers. Now chaos and unpredictability reign everywhere - harmless creatures in the past bring destruction, and the world around is constantly changing, over and over again nullifying the familiar environment around.

COMBINATION OF CLASSIC GAMEPLAY AND MODERN MECHANICS
Take control of one of the brave rangers and go on a responsible mission - find the villains, stop the widespread madness and return peace and justice to the world!
You will meet many unique opponents that will keep you busy: run, jump and shoot to save the world! Each ranger has their own fighting style and special skills, so you can choose the hero that best suits you!

BEAUTIFUL PIXEL GRAPHICS
The universe of Rusty Rangers is full of detailed worlds, original and colorful characters, useful items and bizarre creatures. Each pixel is made with great love. Enjoy the beautiful and incredible world of Rusty Rangers!

STORY QUESTS AND CHARACTERS
Follow the story of Rusty Rangers and find out what really happened and how to fix it. With each new passage you will learn more about this world and its inhabitants. Chat with characters, complete their tasks, and get help in the fight against the cruel baron!
70010000093764.intro: Rusty Rangers is an action platformer and roguelike with elements of metroidvania. Choose your ranger and explore procedurally generated dungeons!
70010000093764.name: Rusty Rangers

70010000097191.description:
On a pitch-black night, screams echo from the house next door. It’s the same place where a series of mysterious murders occurred years ago. Drawn by curiosity, you step inside and descend into a living nightmare. A demonic entity lurks within, determined to consume your very soul.

Forced to explore every room in search of answers and survival, you must collect pages from an old journal that reveal ancient massacres and forbidden rituals from centuries past. As the truth unfolds, so does your fate. Gather the necessary items to complete a desperate exorcism and escape the monstrous force that hunts you.
70010000097191.intro: Dive into this horror and survival experience.
70010000097191.name: CatTerror, the abandoned house

70010000098083.description:
Immerse yourself in a thrilling retro first-person shooter experience that captures the essence of classic console games. Step into a high-octane world filled with espionage, danger, and action as you take on the role of agent . Embark on a series of daring missions that will test your wits, reflexes, and combat skills. Navigate through captivating environments, engage in intense shootouts, and confront enemies armed with cutting-edge AI. The fate of the world rests in your hands as you uncover a global conspiracy and battle through pulse-pounding action sequences.
	•Retro FPS Action: Experience the thrill of first-person shooting, with fast-paced combat, intense firefights, and adrenaline-pumping missions.
	•Engaging Espionage Story: Uncover a global conspiracy as agent, blending stealth, strategy, and action to save the world from an impending threat.
	•Varied Missions & Objectives: Each mission offers unique challenges—hack terminals, steal secrets, rescue hostages, and eliminate enemies in diverse environments.
	•Advanced Enemy AI: Face off against AI that adapts to your every move, making each encounter unpredictable and intense.
	•Iconic Gadgets & Weapons: Use a wide range of spy gadgets and powerful weapons to overcome obstacles and take down enemies in style.

Each story mission is a self-contained environment where you must accomplish varied objectives, such as hacking terminals, stealing secret plans, rescuing civilian hostages, and much more. All the while, you’ll fight armed guards in epic shootouts.

Be the most elite agent the world has ever seen!
70010000098083.intro: Enter the mission and become a legend of espionage.
70010000098083.name: AGENT 07- SPY REVENGE

70010000099610.description:
Welcome to Sleepy Meadow, a relaxing exploration game set in a peaceful valley where time seems to slow down. Nestled between gently rolling hills, lush forests, a sparkling lake, and a cascading waterfall, this cozy meadow is your sanctuary.

Wander at your own pace through the vibrant landscape, discovering hidden paths, tranquil spots, and charming surprises tucked away in nature. Your only goal is to explore everything the cozy meadow has hidden within.

There are no enemies, no time limits, and no pressure—just a beautiful world waiting for you to explore.

Features:
A serene open world to explore at your own pace
Peaceful soundtrack and ambient sounds of nature
Ideal for all ages and fans of cozy, non-violent games
No Rush, Just Peace: There’s no stress.
70010000099610.intro: Wander, unwind, and let the meadow carry you away.
70010000099610.name: Sleepy Meadow

70070000022205.description:
Enemy troops, such as infantry, helicopters, tanks, warplanes, and drones, are coming for you! Jump on the machine gun and shoot them all!

Features:
- Unlock Air Marker secondary weapon with high damage per second!
- Get 60 gold bars to spend on unique weapons or boosters
- Use additional 10000 cash on weapon and troops upgrades
- Defend the country against enemy soldiers
- Fight along your military crew and defeat the opponent's army on multiple warzones
- Upgrade your loadout to win the war
- Use modern war weapons: machine guns, rocket launchers and drones
- Fight and kill bosses!
- Easy controls and realistic graphics for intense action

You're not doing war alone. Your squad is here to help you: 
- Explosive Expert with an RPG rocket launcher to deal tremendous damage to military vehicles
- Rifleman who will shoot at a high range on the open battlefield
- Grenadier who specializes in fighting all ground units. 
You are in charge of the machine gun to clear the battlefield, which is highly addictive and enjoyable!

Missions will take place in different warzones, and you will need to adapt your shooting strategy depending on the battlefield: city, desert, jungle, forest, airport, and many more! Be on the frontline of the battleground or take to the air to shoot enemies from the helicopter!

Beware! Combat will be challenging, and enemies will become stronger over time, so upgrading your guns won't be enough. Level up teammates and prepare your military crew for shooting waves of soldiers!

Do you have what it takes to free your country from invaders and win the war?
70070000022205.intro:
Soldier! War is coming, and duty calls you! 
Enemies are invading our country, and we need YOU to defend it!
70070000022205.name: Infantry Attack: Airstrike Edition

70070000028838.description:
Treat your patients with different dental issues, from cavities to plaque buildup, and watch as their smiles transform under your expert care!

Perform treatments under time pressure, and don't forget about your customer's comfort. If you drill too long in the teeth, the customer will be dissatisfied with your service!

Features:
- perform a lot of different dental procedures on your new mad scientist's chair 
- decorate customers' teeth with new sparkling diamonds or apply a varnish that will change their color
- work under time pressure and do your job the best you can! 
- unlock and apply 12 tooth skins, 10 bling skins, and 10 chair skins
- upgrade the look of your clinic to make it cozier 
- buy an upgrades so your customers can last longer during dental treatment

Pull out decaying teeth and replace them with shiny new ones. Change their shape to fangs or apply braces. Yes doctor, at your salon, your patients LOVE braces!

Don't forget about your special BLING diamond treatment. This is a fancy teeth salon after all! 

Whatever you do, BLING, make them smile!
70070000028838.intro:
Ready for the ultimate dental experience?
Dive into the world of tooth care and become a master dentist!
70070000028838.name: Dentist Bling: Science Edition

70070000028851.description:
A beautiful hidden object game awaits you with Snug Finder: More Fun and Snug Finder: Hidden Joy DLCs — guaranteed to bring you hours of fun!

Snug Finder is a charming hidden object game. Step into the role of a keen-eyed finder and search for all the hidden items — but be warned, it’s not always as easy as it seems!
Immerse yourself in a delightful experience filled with hand-drawn illustrations, soothing sounds, and a cozy atmosphere. Enjoy hours of gameplay across 75 beautifully crafted levels with over 500 hidden objects. Let the adventure begin!

Features:
-Over 500 hidden objects to discover
-75 beautifully illustrated levels
-Stunning hand-drawn visuals
-Relaxing, cozy atmosphere
-Full touchscreen support
70070000028851.intro: Hey there, Finder! You’ve just uncovered something truly special — a charming hidden object adventure with delightful DLCs is waiting for you!
70070000028851.name: Snug Finder: Deluxe Edition

70070000028870.description:
Choose your favourite skin, eat, grow and stay alive. 
Compete in multiplayer mode with up to 4 players or eat it all by yourself.

Features:
- 7 maps with different things to swallow 
- 21 animated skins to make your black hole look cooler
- 2 multiplayer modes up to 4 players on one screen!
- endless mode where you swallow things falling from the sky
- powerups spawning  during the game
- collecting themed stickers
- easy controls so anyone can play
- simple rules and lots of fun!

Grow by swallowing everything in front of you, whether it be garbage cans, fire hydrants or cars. Get large enough to consume even bigger objects or other players. Eat until nothing and no one is standing in your way!
70070000028870.intro: Show who is the biggest black hole in the universe!
70070000028870.name: Hole io: Doomsday Edition

70070000028872.description:
You're about to dive into a sugary adventure! Combine sweets, and prepare yourself for a sugar overload!

NEW VERSUS MODE!
Race to merge the biggest candy while using clever tactics to slow down your opponent. Unleash tricky power-ups, and prove who’s the ultimate candy master!

Gather extraordinary powers that can save you from any sticky situation. Mix them up, and you might create something even more powerful!

Journey through worlds full of surprises. Each has its own set of challenges. Can you master them all and merge the largest sweet?

Features:
- Online leaderboards to show off your skills!
- Co-op mode for you and your friend!
- Versus mode to sabotage your friends!
- 2 standard maps and a new Under Water map!
- New animal characters and swimming accessories
- Fully customizable name and character
- Awesome, game-changing power-ups!
- An adorably sweet aesthetic

Sweeten your day with a new high score!
70070000028872.intro: Don't let the sweets get outside the dome. Merge them together, and make the biggest candy!
70070000028872.name: Candivity: Pirate Edition

70010000098246.description:
Welcome to Cozy Cove, a peaceful pirate island full of mystery, lush jungle trails, and forgotten hideaways. Step into the boots of a curious wanderer and set off on a serene yet intriguing journey across a sun-soaked cove brimming with history and hidden wonders.

This isn't your typical pirate adventure—there are no sword fights or sea battles. Instead, you'll explore at your own pace, soaking in the atmosphere, discovering landmarks, and piecing together the island’s secrets one step at a time.

Features:
Explore a Handcrafted Pirate Island
Relaxing, Non-Linear Gameplay
Environmental Storytelling
Immersive Atmosphere

 Ready to Set Foot on the Island?
70010000098246.intro: Uncover the Secrets of a Lost Pirate Paradise
70010000098246.name: Cozy Cove

70010000080430.description:
Flower Shop: Summer In Fairbrook:

Struggling student Steve is shipped off by his dad to his uncle’s farm for the summer so he can learn responsibility.

Take control of Steve as he spends a summer in Fairbook, working on the farm, making new friends, and maintaining old relationships. You can raise and sell your own crops, spend time with local girls, and schedule activities for your week in advance.

The game features nine different endings that change based on your decisions throughout the game. Will Steve become a good, responsible farmer, find love, or both?


FEATURES
* Dating sim with farming sim gameplay
* Raise your crops and sell them at the market
* Plan how you spend your time with the weekly scheduler
* Relationship system: each character has a relationship value that affects gameplay
* Total of 9 different endings!


Flower Shop: Winter In Fairbrook:

Natalie has barely survived her first semester in college, and all she wants is a break. 

However, her parents insist that she start acting like a responsible adult and get a job during her school's winter break. In no time at all, Natalie's roommate sets her up with a job, and she's shipped off to the town of Fairbrook for a mundane job in a flower shop. What's a poor, tired student to do?

Take control of Natalie as she spends winter in Fairbrook raising flowers, making friends, and maybe even finding love!


Features:
* Same universe as Flower Shop: Summer In Fairbrook
* Visual novel interface
* Dating sim with farming sim gameplay
* Weekly scheduler
* Relationship system
* 9 different endings
70010000080430.intro: ~ Flower Shop: Summer In Fairbrook + Flower Shop: Winter In Fairbrook ~
70010000080430.name: Flower Shop: The Complete Story

70010000095745.description:
The unique co-op experience that made How 2 Escape a success is back with improved gameplay and new challenging puzzles!

The latest edition in the How 2 Escape series, How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine, has you and a partner work together to locate a missing submarine and prevent the start of a global war.


SAVE THE WORLD

An important allied military base has been captured by enemy forces, prompting the government to preemptively order the launch of a torpedo to reclaim it - despite the potential for countless allied deaths. 

However, after further internal discussions and negotiations with the enemy, the government has cancelled the strike that could spark a potential global war. The only problem is "The Triumphant", the submarine carrying the torpedo, is out of communication range and no one can confirm if the cancellation orders have reached the submarine. 

To prevent war, the government has tasked its two best experts, officers Haurée and Leroy, to locate "The Triumphant" before time runs out. These two strategic masterminds of the submarine fleet will face a reality they did not expect, as recent decisions have ignited a moral dilemma among the underwater sailors.


COOPERATE TO WIN

2 players, 2 ways to play!

Put your communication and puzzle-solving skills to the test as you and a partner work together to prevent the start of war! Each of you has a crucial role to play that requires logic, coordination, observation and, above all, communication!

As player one, your job is to locate and investigate the inside of the submarine, where you’ll explore and interact with the environment.

Your friend is tasked with using the dedicated free companion app* to gather additional information so you both can solve the puzzles together. 

*Get the free How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine Companion App on your smartphone.

Features: 
• Co-op puzzle solving with a friend
• Only one copy of the game is needed
• Increasingly challenging puzzles
• Simple controls
70010000095745.intro: How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine is an escape room-like puzzle game where two players need to cooperate on different devices to prevent the start of a global war.
70010000095745.name: How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine

70010000096242.description:
Dive into a challenging action RPG with stunning HD pixel art and stylish, fast-paced combat—experience Journey to the West like never before in a bold new reimagining of the legendary tale!

·Amazing New Content:
Meet a new playable character, master new skills, and wield a powerful new weapon—the Katana. Unlock hidden levels and items for even more diverse and dynamic battles.

·Engaging Battle: 
Experience high-octane, stylized action designed for maximum enjoyment and tactical depth. A variety of advanced combat techniques, including Evade, Charged Attacks, Block, Counter, Punish, Just Timing, Cancel, and Throw/Execute mechanics. 

·Seamless Blend of Scenery: Encounter a unique mix of classic gameplay elements and modern design, featuring challenging adversaries and ingenious level architecture.

·Intense and Challenging Boss: 
Fights Bosses feature multiple phases, counterattacks, and blocking mechanics, even perform devastating combo or fusion attacks. And be prepared—some battles involve more than one boss at a time!
70010000096242.intro: A challenging action combat experience on Journey to the West with your companions!
70010000096242.name: Arisen Force: Life Devotee

70010000097043.description:
In the third chapter of the Bee Flowers series, you’ll guide bees through stunning environments while solving logic puzzles on a hexagonal grid. The goal is simple: connect paths to deliver pollen to the flowers. The gameplay is accessible, but the challenges increase as you progress.

With 30 carefully designed levels, the game features three distinct biomes:
Green Fields: A peaceful green field, perfect for learning the mechanics and getting used to the game’s rhythm.
Autumn Grove: An autumn scene with leaves covering the paths and winds affecting the bees' movement.
Winter Hollow: A cold, serene environment where puzzles require more planning and attention.

Bee Flowers: Save the Garden combines minimalist visuals, a relaxing soundtrack, and thoughtful mechanics to offer an engaging experience, perfect for puzzle lovers with a touch of personality.

Time to save the garden — one path at a time.
70010000097043.intro: The bees are back for another mission
70010000097043.name: Bee Flowers: Save the Garden

70010000097223.description:
Step into the world of retail and take charge of your very own supermarket in Supermarket Simulator 2025! Start small and work your way up, managing inventory, setting prices, and keeping customers happy. Whether it's stocking shelves with everyday essentials or the latest must-have toys, your decisions shape the success of your store.

Customize your supermarket’s layout, hire and train staff, and ensure smooth day-to-day operations. Handle online orders, make deliveries by scooter, and trade rare items to boost profits. Keep an eye on security, deal with unexpected events, and create a shopping experience that keeps customers coming back.

Can you turn a humble store into a thriving retail empire? The doors are open, and the business is in your hands!
70010000097223.intro: Because every empire starts with a teddy bear.
70010000097223.name: Supermarket Simulator 2025

70010000099571.description:
Cozy Gardener Simulator is a heartwarming game where you become a caring gardener and the keeper of coziness in a small town. Grow vegetables and flowers in your very
own garden, take care of flower beds, tend to your plants, and beautify the streets. Keep lawns neat and tidy using your trusty lawnmower to trim overgrown grass.

Features:
-Grow and nurture your garden with seeds, water, and fertilizer.
-Care for the town by mowing lawns, tending flower beds, and cleaning up litter.
-Meet and help townsfolk with their small requests, building friendships along the way.
-Enjoy relaxing, slow-paced gameplay with no pressure or time limits.
-Collect tools, unlock seeds and decorations to expand your garden and keep the town
charming.
Discover the stories of the townspeople, complete wholesome quests, and fill your days with simple joys. In Cozy Gardener Simulator, every small task brings warmth and beauty to the town—and to your heart.
70010000099571.intro: Plant, water, and grow – fun at every step.
70010000099571.name: Cozy Gardener Simulator

70010000085884.description:
Brace yourself for the darkest chapter yet in the epic Poppy Playtime saga.

You are pushed deeper into the undiscovered depths of the Playtime Co. factory, far below anything the world knew. Here, you’ll encounter terrifying new threats and discover shocking revelations. Can you outwit the unnatural new creations lurking in the shadows? Can you survive here long enough to eventually unravel the mysteries behind the experiments? Every step will test your courage, every puzzle will challenge your mind, and every corner may be your last.

Features:

New Characters (and Allies): New extraordinary characters guide your way, and haunt your nightmares.

Expanded Lore: Discover more about the dark secrets of Playtime Co. and its twisted past.

Mind-Bending Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that could mean the difference between life and death.

Heart-Pounding Atmosphere: With haunting visuals and immersive sound design, the terror never lets up.

Will you escape the horrors hidden within Playtime Co., or will you succumb to the terror?
70010000085884.name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 4

70010000088928.description:
The Grand Opening:
Welcome to Once Upon a Puppet, a 2.5D puzzle-platformer that unfolds within a vibrant world of theater. Take part in a magical tale that combines classic platforming with puppet-inspired gameplay, in a captivating story of friendship, self-discovery, and redemption.

Wear the glove of Nieve, a Stagehand exiled to the Understage, and wield control over Drev’s strings, a Puppet magically bound to her. As they journey to return to the Frontstage above, they will retell forgotten stories, uncover shadowy secrets, and learn their fate is interwoven with the kingdom of theater itself.

Highlights:
Become Puppet and Puppeteer: Pull the strings and master the art of puppetry in this unique approach to action, movement, and creative puzzle-solving. 
A Troupe of Characters: Meet an ensemble cast of dozens of Major and supporting characters, featuring hundreds of lines of handcrafted dialogue. 
Deadly Shadows: Face a horde of villainous creatures who will do all they can to snuff out the lights and bring the show to an untimely end. 
A Meticulously Crafted World: Marvel at the stylized and detailed graphics that reinforce the magic of theater, with stages that fluctuate between past and present. 
Set The Scene: Arrange and move props, backdrops and characters to rebuild theatrical stages, and re-enact scenes to unveil what befell the once proud World Stage. 
Enchanting Soundscapes: Be captivated by a rich, theatrical soundtrack and immersive sound effects that bring the world of Once Upon a Puppet to life...


The Leading Actors:
Unwittingly bound together by spool and thread, Drev and Nieve reluctantly embark on a quest to reclaim their place in the theater, against a heartbroken King.

Nieve, a talented Weaver beset by self doubt, builds a strong bond with Drev, a naive yet ambitious Actor. With Drev's unbridled theatrics and Nieve's brilliance, they will conquer their deepest held fears to reveal the truth of the void harbored in their hearts.
70010000088928.intro: Control the strings of fate and embark on a grand adventure in the theatrical-inspired world of Drev & Nieve in Once Upon a Puppet.
70010000088928.name: Once Upon a Puppet

70010000095300.description:
Team up with your "other self", Honno-chan, as you parry, pummel and pulse your way out of your darkest nightmare in this one-of-a-kind "parry heaven" action game!

Use your nightmare's strength against it with your trusty parry move! Stun foes, send away projectiles, and stop threats right in their tracks by chaining parries!

Honno-chan will defeat any foes you stun automatically. Leave them to her and focus on the defense!

Parrying grants your soul more and more courage to face the night! Heal up by continuing to parry! Spend excess soul to unleash a powerful Burst move to wipe out hordes of enemies at once!

Collect powerups from rare foes to supercharge Honno-chan! Breathe fire, deploy orbital pain, wreak havoc, and more!

Defeated enemies drop light. Collect light and the darkness of the nightmare abates, giving you a clearer view of the chaos. Max out your light meter to beat the nightmare!

Will you be able to escape the nightmare and greet a new day...?
70010000095300.intro:
Easy to pick up, and hard to put down! 
Parry Nightmare is a one-of-a-kind "parry heaven" action game where the best offense is a good defense!
70010000095300.name: Parry Nightmare

70010000095619.description:
Meet the Ex-Calibre Knights, elite pilots in state-of-the-art exo-mechs, defending peace, justice and hope across the world! The Exo-Tech corporation is dedicated to developing advanced weapons and defenses to aid humanity, but when AI drones go haywire and start attacking the populous, it’s up to you to take control of the Ex-Calibre Knights and restore order by any means necessary!
